title: Animation Seisaku Shinkou Kuromi-chan 2

alternative_titles.ja: アニメーション制作進行くろみちゃん 2

synopsis:
After rookie producer Mikiko Oguro manages to guide her team through the production of the anime Time Journeys, the president of Studio Petit announces that the studio will be producing three different shows for the upcoming season. With Mikiko barely able to hold the tiny team together, the president calls in a veteran producer to ease the burden on her shoulders. However, when the new producer starts cutting corners in order to meet the strict deadlines, the team becomes jaded and wonder if they are working on a production they can truly be proud of.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
